short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost productivity with Focus Mode! Block distracting sites, set focus timers, track usage, and get alerts to stay on task.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus Mode is a extension designed to help you stay focused and productive by blocking distracting websites. Whether you're working, studying, or just trying to maintain your focus, Focus Mode ensures that you won't be interrupted by unnecessary web distractions.

Key Features:

⏰ Focus Timer: Set a specific focus timer and remain undisturbed by blocking all listed distracting websites during that period.
🚫 Site Blocking: Block access to certain websites by adding them to your blacklist.
🔑 Keyword Blocking: Block any URLs containing specific keywords to avoid unwanted content.
📊 Usage Statistics: Monitor your website visits during the blocking and manage your time effectively.
🕒 Time-Based Blocking: Enable and set specific time ranges during which certain sites should be blocked to help you maintain your schedule.

With Focus Mode, enhance your productivity and create a distraction-free browsing environment.
